articles.title: Two Former Wagner Fighters Recall Slaughter, Fear Amid Fierce Ukrainian Resistance - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Two former fighters of the Russian private military company Wagner captured by Ukraine told CNN their units suffered massive losses in the Donbas.
